snippet.title: BIGGEST CRINGE MOMENTS IN SPORTS
snippet.description:
Welcome to DAILY JOYTIME and today’s video is about awkward moments, biggest cringe  moments in sports.

Cringe moments happen all the time and the world of sport is no different. Lucky for us, there are always cameras filming every moment on the track, pitch or ring. So, to entertain you, we have compiled some of the funny moments in sports.

▶️Here are most funny Cringe moments:

Commentary below the production process.

-----------------------------------
For those of you interested on HOW I MAKE MY VIDEOS, I start with research on each topic to find the best way to tell the story in most funny, interesting and entertaining way. Then I am sorting and editing (In Final Cut Pro X studio) clips in order to make the best watch experience for you guys :) I use different stock footages (both free and paid), clips of videos that I can find related to the video and search images to visualize the narrative and story that I’m trying to tell - I do Cuts, Slow-Motions, Play-backs, Reverse plays and add elements, images, memes and much more. 
Then comes the WRITING.. I am trying to use DRY english humor and COMMENTATE/REPORT/REACT about all the moments happened in the video to make it more entertaining and super-pleasurable to watch!
And of course you all know my funny intros and especially outros you all love for each video - each one is different with some kind of funny voice impersonation :))
My good friend with perfect english voice helps me to Voice Over all the videos, because my english and voice are not even close to his - Thank you McRiddle!
Then I research and add background music that most fit to the topic and i do play a lot with volume editing, cuts, sounds etc. to make it sound perfect.
After all this is sorted together I start FINAL editing and revising of the video - I do more Cuts, Slow-Motions, Play-backs, Reverse plays and add more elements to get the best final output.
The commentary/editing style is unique and adds value by putting it into my own style and commentating all the clips stating my opinions/making it funnier in addition to a myriad of edits to the videos which transforms the work making it different and unique each video.
I literally spend 8-14 hours everyday by producing my videos and i love it! ))
-----------------------------------

▶ 1. Moto GP: This Motor Cycle GP race driver got completely carried away when he did this up the skirt of the on-Stage models.

▶ 2. Tennis: When this kid challenges and beats Roger Federer, the star himself couldn't believe what had just happened.

▶ 3. Boxing: See here, Don't you just hate it when you read a situation all wrong?

▶ 4. Moto GP: After somehow slipping on to another bike during your race, these riders break out into a fight on the track.

▶ 5. Basketball: This guy scored the winning shot for his opponent.

▶ 6. Football: Acting as choked.

▶ 7. Football: Although it is a creative celebration, it wasn't appreciated by the ref.

▶ 8. Football: Amazing Penalty to show off. 

▶ 9. Football: Some cheats will do anything to come out on top.

▶ 10. Wrestling: This wrestler who decided to pull off an anime move with his opponent.

▶ 11. Mma: This is why dancing and fighting does not mix.

▶ 12.Golf:  It seems like this guy has heard the call of the wild and he's answering back.

▶ 13. Athletics: And this is why it's important to prepare ahead of time.

▶ 14. Football: Although Linking Park is loved by many people, unfortunately, their music 
isn't the national anthem.

▶ 15. Gaming: This handshake is enough to make anyone cringe.

▶ 16. Baseball: This kid's sweet gesture isn't what it seems. Keeping the game ball for 
himself.

▶ 17. Football: This manager's reaction to a burst Football is hilarious.

▶ 18. Tennis: This cameraman forgot where he was when he did this to Maria Sharapova.

▶ 19. Ice Hockey: That's one player you don't want to annoy.

So, watch the video till the end and leave comments below, we love hearing from you.

If you like this video, please SUBSCRIBE and don’t forget to press the bell, 🔔 like, comment and share. Stay safe and Love all. 😍😘
----------------------------------------------------------
▶️ Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/c/DAILYJOYTIME/
--------------------------------------------------
▶️Follow me on:
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dailyjoytime/
• Facebook: https://web.facebook.com/DailyJoytime/
-----------------------------------------
▶️For business enquiries: daily.joytime@gmail.com
-----------------------------------------
▶️My other videos:
• Funny Moments With Ball Boys: https://youtu.be/b9Fx4A6Y9GQ
• WHAT COULD GO WRONG!: https://youtu.be/rujMtCR45nA
• Japanese Master of Prison Break: https://youtu.be/prGANOAglwM
• THEY FORGOT THEY WERE LIVE: https://youtu.be/9DFEww1nFec
-------------------------------------------
